title: The Renegade Apprentice
description: A desperate breakout. A perilous life on the streets. A fight to the death.Evrenâ€™s life as an apprentice priest is an endless torment, until he seizes the chance to escape his slavery. But his freedom, and his life, may be cut very short because the dark alleys of Vothmot hold their own dangers...some deadlier than others!
author: Andy Peloquin
